example_item.name: test item with all fields
description: Arrays of descriptors are output on separate lines.

useDescription: You stick the example item in the lock and jiggle it. You hear a click.

loaf_of_bread.name: LOAF OF BREAD
description: A mouldy, stale 'loaf of bread'. It has been nibbled by rats and doesn't look fit for humans to eat anymore.

main_dungeon_door.name: DUNGEON DOOR
main_dungeon_door.description: A heavy iron door with an intricate keyhole blocks your path to the 'NORTH'.

dungeon_key.name: DUNGEON KEY
description: An ancient, rusty, 'DUNGEON KEY'. It's surface is worn and pitted. There seems to be dried blood smeared on the handle.

useDescription: You push the heavy key into the lock and turn it
